fieldUpdates.formula: IF(text(Audit_Frequency__c) = "Weekly", Today()+7, IF(text(Audit_Frequency__c)= "Bi-weekly", Today()+14, IF(text(Audit_Frequency__c)= "Monthly", Today()+30, IF(text(Audit_Frequency__c)= "Quarterly", Today()+90, IF(text(Audit_Frequency__c)= "Semi-Annual", Today()+180, IF(text(Audit_Frequency__c)= "Annually", Today()+365, IF(text(Audit_Frequency__c)= "Biennal", Today()+730, IF(text(Audit_Frequency__c)= "18 Months", Today()+545,null ) ) ) ) ))))
fieldUpdates.name: Audit date caliculate

fieldUpdates.description: This field is used to show the Number of Users select the Solution as to Remove
fieldUpdates.formula: IF(ISPICKVAL(Useful_Solution__c, "No. This Solution should be removed from the database"), If( ISNULL(No_of_Solutions_Accepted__c),1, (No_of_Solutions_Accepted__c+ 1)), No_of_Solutions_Accepted__c)
fieldUpdates.name: Remove Solutions FieldUpdate

fieldUpdates.description: If Status=Approved and RecordType=CSO Non Technical, Change record type of Solution to Read Only
fieldUpdates.name: Solution CSO Read Only

fieldUpdates.description: If Status=Approved and RecordType=GTO Non Technical, Change record type of Solution to Read Only
fieldUpdates.name: Solution GTO Read Only
Status field is updated as approved
UpContent Review after Audit Approved By

fieldUpdates.description: Update Content Review Approver After Aud
fieldUpdates.name: Update Content Review Approver After Aud

fieldUpdates.description: This will revert back the Picklist value to None
fieldUpdates.name: Update UsefulSolution Picklist

fieldUpdates.description: This field is used to count he Number of Users select the Solution as Useful
fieldUpdates.formula: IF( ISPICKVAL(Useful_Solution__c, "Yes, this is a useful Solution"), If( ISNULL(Useful_Solutions__c),1, (Useful_Solutions__c+ 1)), Useful_Solutions__c)
fieldUpdates.name: Useful Solutions FieldUpdate

rules.fullName: ACT Solution Creation
rules.description: ACT Solution creation notification to the Craig Youngberg, Christopher Long, Nicole Williams and DeAndre Wadlington

rules.fullName: ACT Solution Rejection
Approved Date required if Status is Approved
rules.description: Approved Date required if Status is Approved

rules.fullName: CAS%2FCMC Repository Solution Creation Notification alert
rules.description: Send email to Richard Van Riper when a solution is created with record type EPIC (CAS/CMC Repository).

rules.fullName: Notify Standards Review Approver
Notify Standards Review Approver Manager if Review not done in 14 Days
rules.description: Notify Approver Manager if Standard Review not done in 14 Days
rules.formula: AND ( ISPICKVAL(Status, 'Standards Review') , NOT(ISBLANK( TechnicalStandardReviewDate__c )), (TODAY() - TechnicalStandardReviewDate__c) = 14 )

rules.fullName: Notify Standards Review Approver if Review not done in 7 Days
rules.description: Notify Approver if Standard Review not done in 7 Days
rules.formula: AND ( ISPICKVAL(Status, 'Standards Review') , NOT(ISBLANK( TechnicalStandardReviewDate__c )), (TODAY() - TechnicalStandardReviewDate__c) = 7 )

rules.fullName: Notify Technical Review Approver Manager if Review not done in 14 Days
rules.description: Notify Approver Manager if Technical Review not done in 14 Days
rules.formula: AND ( ISPICKVAL(Status, 'Technical Review') , NOT(ISBLANK( TechnicalStandardReviewDate__c )), (TODAY() - TechnicalStandardReviewDate__c) = 14 )

rules.fullName: Notify Technical Review Approver if Review not done in 7 Days
rules.description: Notify Approver if Technical Review not done in 7 Days
rules.formula: AND ( ISPICKVAL(Status, 'Technical Review') , NOT(ISBLANK( TechnicalStandardReviewDate__c )), (TODAY() - TechnicalStandardReviewDate__c) = 7 )

rules.description: To update the Primary and Secondary approver fields with values from Supported Products

rules.description: This Rule will check whether the Useful Solution Pick list is selected as No.

rules.fullName: Update Technical and Standard Review Date
rules.description: Update Technical and Standard Review Date
rules.formula: AND ( OR( ISPICKVAL(Status, 'Technical Review') , ISPICKVAL(Status, 'Standards Review')), ISBLANK(TechnicalStandardReviewDate__c) )
